title: Small Scale Hypertextual Web Search Engine
desc: Implemented a web crawler from scratch for indexing using Python and MongoDB. Developed a ranking algorithm to provide accurate search results, integrating the web application with MongoDB.

title: Typing Tutor
desc: Developed a typing tutor that dynamically generates words based on user mistakes, improving typing accuracy by 60%. The project analyzed user errors to create a personalized learning experience.

title: API Testing and Automation
desc: Improved API testing through manual scripts and Postman. Implemented automation scripts for testing web applications and Android apps using Python Selenium and Appium, identifying critical bugs such as stored cross-site scripting (XSS).

title: Codeforces Competitive Programming
desc: Actively participated in competitive programming on Codeforces. Achieved a max rank of 1768, solving complex algorithmic problems and enhancing problem-solving skills.
